bete0noire: I couldnt appreciate fanny packs being a trend again... The one time I tried to shop for one I was so embarrassed, having to let out the belts while people made looks, trying to hide myself as I wrapped them around only to find it barely closed. Same issue ive had when shopping for belts. Something as seemingly simple as fanny packs being available to all sizes can bring tears to my eyes. I'm still trying to learn how to love myself, and un-learn all the hatred and shame I've adopted throughout life. To see that it is not only okay to take up space, but that there really are people proactively making that space a possibility... Yeah, all the feels lol. I must also say, seeing/reading you talk about bikes has inspired me to buy a pump for the tires of my own dust-gathering bike. Ive been all embarrassed to use it, and while i still have too much anxiety to take it out during the day I plan on trying to take it out one night soon (hopefully I can still ride a bike okay 😅). So i want to thank you, for reminding me that I'm a person allowed to do a thing. I'm gonna try to be brave. And maybe even treat myself to a fanny pack! ❤️
